page.title: 11THE BAKERY J EVELEIGH
page.content:
My name is Jim Eveleigh. I live at the Bakery Gittisham with my wife and two daughters. (There have been Eveleighs in Gittisham for hundreds of years).
The bakery is a working Bakery and Grocers, selling in the village and surrounding area from two vans. I start work at about 5:15 am. We make three types of bread; white is the most popular, but wholemeal is now second and is increasing all the time. We have recently started to make Top Cobber, a wheatmeal with added malt and whole grains. I use traditional methods for mixing doughs using only flour, salt yeast fat and milk powder with no additives. The last of the bread comes out of the oven at about 9:15 am, it is then loaded into the vans and delivered to customers along with groceries, fruit and vegetables.
